CreateAzureKinect
CRefObj<IAzureKinect> CreateAzureKinect(
int deviceId,
ColorMode colorMode,
DepthMode depthMode,
FPSMode fpsMode,
bool captureBodies
)

CreateAzureKinect instantiates an instance of an Azure Kinect camera

Parameters
deviceId
int

indicates which device to use

colorMode
ColorMode

output size of color images

depthMode
DepthMode

output size of depth images

fpsMode
FPSMode

requested frame rate

captureBodies
bool

should skeleton tracking be used

Returns

Returns the created Azure Kinect device
